name: prepare patches coordinates and targets
description: If you consider training a classification approach on a patch level one possible way is to prepare patch coordinates and targets in advance. Than use this data as an input into Dataset.
script: __init__ multiprocessing make_grid List tqdm.auto Optional PatchSlicer GridSearcher numpy make_grid_from_wsi_and_mask typing Tuple make_grid_mp pandas tqdm Pool patch_generator patches_coords_and_targets_to_df make_grid_from_wsi_only
